 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶרְוָה‎</span><sub>54</sub> **noun feminine** ==nakedness, pudenda==; — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Exod.28.42|Exod 28:42]]; [[Lev.18.6|Lev 18:6]] usually construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶרְוַת‎</span> [[Gen.9.22|Gen 9:22]] +, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶרְוָתְךָ‎</span> [[Exod.20.23|Exod 20:23]] ([[BDB#Gi|Ginsb]]), [[Lev.18.10|Lev 18:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶרְוָתֵךְ‎</span> [[Isa.47.3|Isa 47:3]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת֯וֺ‎</span> [[Lev.20.17|Lev 20:17]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָ֯הּ‎</span> [[Lev.18.7|Lev 18:7]] +; suffix 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶרְוָתָן‎</span> v[[Lev.18.9|Lev 18:9]] v[[Lev.18.10|Lev 18:10]] — 

**1.** ***pudenda***, of man <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָאָה ע‎</span> implying shameful exposure [[Gen.9.22|Gen 9:22]]; [[Gen.9.23|Gen 9:23]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); mostly of woman: figurative of Jerusalem (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָאָה‎</span>) [[Lam.1.3|Lam 1:3]]; [[Ezek.16.37|Ezek 16:37]] usually with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׃ נלה‎</span> literal <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּגָּלֶה ע‎</span> i.e. be exposed to view [[Exod.20.23|Exod 20:23]] ([[BDB#Gi|Ginsb]]; [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] v[[Exod.20.26|Exod 20:26]] [[BDB#E|E]]), so, as shameful punishment, figurative of Egypt [[Isa.20.4|Isa 20:4]] (gloss according to [[BDB#Du|Du]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Di|Di-Kit]]), Babylonian [[Isa.47.3|Isa 47:3]], of Jerusalem [[Ezek.16.37|Ezek 16:37]]; [[Ezek.23.10|Ezek 23:10]]; [[Ezek.23.29|Ezek 23:29]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶרְוַת זְנוּנַיִךְ‎</span>; all three object of active verb); chiefly euphemism for cohabitation, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גִּלָּה ע‎</span> [[Lev.18.6|Lev 18:6]] + (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גלה‎</span> **Pi\`el 1 a**; ==figurative of Jerusalem== (verb passive) [[Ezek.16.36|Ezek 16:36]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָאָה ע‎</span> in same meaning [[Lev.20.17|Lev 20:17]] (twice in verse) ([[BDB#H|H]]; of both sexes); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> also [[Lev.18.8|Lev 18:8]]; [[Lev.18.10|Lev 18:10]]; [[Lev.18.16|Lev 18:16]] ([[BDB#H|H]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּסָּה ע‎</span> ***cover nakedness*** [[Gen.9.23|Gen 9:23]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Exod.28.42|Exod 28:42]] ([[BDB#P|P]]; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּשַׂר ע‎</span>), [[Hos.2.11|Hos 2:11]] (figurative of Israel), [[Ezek.16.8|Ezek 16:8]] (of Jerusalem); reviling words are <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִמֶּ֑ךָ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְבשֶׁת ע‎</span> [[1Sam.20.30|1Sam 20:30]] (compare [[BDB#Doughty|Doughty]]<sup>Arab. Deserta i. 269</sup>). 

**2.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶרְוַת דָּבָר‎</span> ***nakedness of a thing***, i.e. probably ***indecency***, improper behaviour [[Deut.23.15|Deut 23:15]]; [[Deut.24.1|Deut 24:1]] (see [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]). 

**3.** figurative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָאָרֶץ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Gen.42.9|Gen 42:9]]; [[Gen.42.12|Gen 42:12]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), i.e. its exposed, undefended parts (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">).
